      • createListEntry

        private static java.lang.String createListEntry(CSMethod method,
                               java.lang.String linkSrc,
                               java.lang.String linkEnd,
                               boolean calls)
        Create a HTML list entry of a specified method.
        Parameters:
        method - The method, which is to be output in the list.
        linkSrc - Begin HTML link tag to the check source HTML result file.
        linkEnd - End HTML link tag to the check source HTML result file.
        calls - If the list of tested methods (true) or untested methods (false) are created?
        Returns:
        The created HTML list entry of the specified method.
